Uses of Class
activity.CommentPageActivity

  • Packages that use CommentPageActivity 
    Package Description
    network_io  

    • Uses of CommentPageActivity in network_io

      Methods in network_io with parameters of type CommentPageActivity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NetworkObserver.setObserver(CommentPageActivity activity)
      Will be called when the Internet is connected, start check if the Internet goes off each 5 seconds, if the Internet goes off, then stop checking and call refresh method in the Activity.
      void NetworkObserver.startObservation(CommentPageActivity activity)
      Will be called when the Internet is not connected, start check if the Internet connects each 5 seconds, if the Internet is connected, then stop checking and call refresh method in the Activity.
